value.title: Create a New Power BI Workspace Using Power Shell | Power BI with PowerShell
value.excerpt: In this video, we will learn how we can create a new Power BI Workspace using PowerShell.  Power BI Powershell provides us the flexibility to create a new Workspace by running just one single command. Once we create the Power BI Workspace, we can also add a description of the Workspace using the Power
